sentences.sContent: Just in the last few years, the last sardine cannery, in Maine, closed its doors.
sentences.sContent_eng: Just in the last few years, the last sardine cannery, in Maine, closed its doors.
sentences.sCn: 就在近几年，最后的沙丁鱼罐头工厂，在缅因州关门了。

sentences.sContent: Just in the last few years, the last sardine cannery, in Maine, closed its doors.
sentences.sContent_eng: Just in the last few years, the last sardine cannery, in Maine, closed its doors.
sentences.sCn: 仅仅在过去的几年里，缅因州的最后几家沙丁鱼罐头厂也倒闭了。

trans.tranOther: a factory where food is put into cans
